column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////For my inaugural visit
column2: I only had the opportunity to try a vanilla latte and a Pain au Chocolat (or a Chocolate Croissant as the Panera crowd calls it...just kidding)
column3: but it has set a strong baseline for the rest of the cuisine when I return!  The latte was flavorful but not too sweet
column7: as all good croissants should be.  I've heard some rank their pastries right up there with what you'd find in Paris
column8: and since it's been 4+ years since I've been there
column9: I'm just going to have to take their word for it.  Regardless
column10: it's right up there with some of the best I've had.
